member.name: T:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers
member.summary: A collection of static API helpers for retreiving colors from various data points.

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorApiJson(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the jSon Object for TheColorAPI data using ColorfulJsonParser.
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object with data relating to RGB values provided

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorfulRestProperty(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the ColorfulRestProperty for a color.
member.returns: ColorfulRestProperty with the data relating to provided RGB values

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorApiJson(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the jSon Object for TheColorAPI data using ColorfulJsonParser.
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object with data relating to CMYK values provided

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorfulRestProperty(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the ColorfulRestProperty for a color.
member.returns: ColorfulRestProperty with the data relating to provided CMYK values

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorApiJson(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Gets the jSon Object for TheColorAPI data using ColorfulJsonParser.
member.param: Character for the S and L values. Pass null for default '%'.
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object with data relating to HSL values provided

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorfulRestProperty(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Gets the jSon Object for TheColorAPI data using ColorfulJsonParser.
member.param: Character for the S and L values. Pass null for default '%'.
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object with data relating to HSL values provided.

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorApiJson(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the jSon Object for TheColorAPI data using ColorfulJsonParser.
member.param: String representing the hexidecimal value (HTML Code)
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object with data relating to the hexidecimal value provided.

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.getColorfulRestProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the ColorfulRestProperty for a color.
member.param: String representing the hexidecimal value (HTML Code)
member.returns: ColorfulRestProperty with the data relating to the hexidecimal value provided.

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ApiHelpers.hitApiWithUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Hits the URL to get the ColorfulJsonParser object.
member.returns: (ColorfulJsonParser)object.

member.summary: Hexidecimal (HTML) value for the color. (Includes #)

member.summary: Clean Hexidecimal (HTML) value for the color.

member.summary: Creates the Hex data from user provided values.

The clean hexidecimal value for a color (Example: 01A1B1)

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.ColorfulRestProperty.rgb
member.summary: The RGB (Red, Green Blue) Color Space Data for the Color Object

member.summary: The collection of RGB values in ushort. (Base: ColorfulGeneric.RGB(ushort))

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulRestProperty.rgb.Fraction
member.summary: The collection of RGB fractions in decimal. (Base: ColorfulGeneric.RGB(decimal))

member.name: M:ColorApiLib.ColorfulRestProperty.rgb.ToString
member.summary: Gets a string representing the RGB values.
member.returns: Returns a string representing the RGB values.

member.summary: Gets the API URL to query TheColorApi for this color using RGB method.
member.returns: The API Url.

member.summary: Creates RGB Data from ColorfulJsonParser RGB data

member.summary: Creates RBG Data from user provided arrays of ushorts and decimals.
member.param: An array of ushorts representing RGB values ([0]:Red, [1]:Green, [2]:Blue)
An array of decimals representing RGB fractions ([0]:Red, [1]:Green, [2]:Blue)

member.summary: Gets data relating to hte color object.

member.returns: allData = True - Gets the RGB, HSL, HSV, XYZ and CMYK colorspace data for the object in string form allData = False - Gets the name of the color

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser
member.summary: The data for the scheme returned.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser.Mode
member.summary: Defines the Mode of the scheme returned. For example: "analogic"

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser.Count
member.summary: Defines the total number of colors returned.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser.Colors
member.summary: Defines the colors returned for the scheme. This comes in the form of multiple ColorfulJsonParser objects.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser.Seed
member.summary: Gets the seed color for the scheme. This is the same as a ColorfulJsonParser object.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeJsonParser.images
member.summary: Gets the image details for the scheme.

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.schemeImageData
member.summary: Composes the image data.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeImageData.Bare
member.summary: Contains the data for the images without names.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeImageData.Named
member.summary: Contains the data for the images with names.

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.schemeLinks
member.summary: Gets the link details for the scheme

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinks.Self
member.summary: Gets the self referencing link for the scheme. (The link that was queried through the API)

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinks.Schemes
member.summary: Gets a collection of all the available schemes for a given color.

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes
member.summary: Defines the various scheme links for the color.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.Monochrome
member.summary: Gets the link for the Monochrome scheme.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.MonochromeDark
member.summary: Gets the link for the Monochrome-Dark scheme.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.MonochromeLight
member.summary: Gets the link for the Monochrome-Light scheme.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.Analogic
member.summary: Gets the link for the Analogic scheme.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.Complement
member.summary: Gets the link for the Complement scheme.

member.name: P:ColorApiLib.schemeLinkSchemes.AnalogicComplement
member.summary: Gets the link for the Analogic-Complement scheme.

member.name: T:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links
member.summary: The links to the other color schemes available for the Seed.

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.Monochrome
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed in a monochrome palet.

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.MonochromeDark
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed in a dark themed monochrome palet.

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.MonochromeLight
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed in a light themed monochrome palet.

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.Analogic
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed that are similar to eachother (this is the default scheme).

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.Complement
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed that complement eachother (these may or may not include the original seed).

member.name: F:ColorApiLib.ColorfulSchemeRestProperty.links.AnalogicComplement
member.summary: A scheme of colors for the Seed that complement eachother and are similar to the Seed (these may or may not include the original seed).
